name: Crazy Axe
description: Crazy Axe is an exciting arcade game where you need to take all the trees out of your way with an exact blow of an ax. So many trees, so much excitement! Play on new maps, chop down trees with one blow, make combos and get more and more points. Simple mechanics, but playing is much more difficult than it seems at first glance. Try to become a real guru in the Crazy Axe!
